thread.title: Nice hotel in the Latin Quarter, close to RER B
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in the Latin Quarter, close to RER B - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: I3893GEsarab
title: Nice hotel in the Latin Quarter, close to RER B
text:
Excellent room and service, with good breakfast, nice bed and pillows. The only issue was hearing loud voices and people at night, audible in my room facing the St. Severin church. Other rooms didn't have that problem.
Room Tip: book a room that doesn't face the small pedestrian street facing the church. See more room tips
